contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road| |province=QC |type=QC |route=352 |maint=[[Transports Québec]] and Municipalities of Saint-Narcisse, Saint-Stanislas, Saint-Adelphe and Sainte-Thècle.<ref>The section between the villages of Saint-Narcisse and Saint-Stanislas (km 20.2 to km 29.5) is a local road managed by the municipalities of Saint-Narcisse and Saint-Stanislas</ref><ref>The section between the Rang Saint-Émile and the Route 153 (km 47 and 55.4) is a local road managed by the municipalities of Saint-Adelphe and Sainte-Thècle.</ref> |map= |established= |decommissioned= |alternate_name= |length_km=55.4 |length_round=1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page 101, Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_a=West |direction_b=East |terminus_a=[[Image:Quebec Autoroute 40.svg|15px]] in [[Trois-Rivières]] |terminus_b=[[Image:qc153.svg|15px]] in [[Sainte-Thècle, Quebec|Sainte-Thecle]]| |previous_type=QC |previous_route=351 |next_type=QC |next_route=354 |cities= |junction= [[Image:qc159.svg|15px]] in [[Saint-Stanislas, Mauricie, Quebec|Saint-Stanislas]] |}} '''Route 352''' is a 55 km east-west provincial road in the [[Mauricie]] region in [[Quebec]], [[Canada]]. It goes north from [[Saint-Maurice, Quebec|Saint-Maurice]] (exit 210 of [[Quebec Autoroute 40|autoroute 40]]) to [[Sainte-Thècle, Quebec|Sainte-Thècle]]. It goes through the villages of St-Maurice, [[Saint-Narcisse, Quebec|Saint-Narcisse]], [[Saint-Stanislas, Mauricie, Quebec|Saint-Stanislas]], [[Saint-Adelphe, Quebec|Saint-Adelphe]], and then Sainte-Thècle. From the Saint-Narcisse-Saint-Stanislas border, it follows the [[Batiscan River]] to past Saint-Adelphe. ==Municipalities along Route 352== * [[Trois-Rivières]] * [[Saint-Maurice, Quebec|Saint-Maurice]] * [[Saint-Luc-de-Vincennes, Quebec|Saint-Luc-de-Vincennes]] * [[Saint-Narcisse, Quebec|Saint-Narcisse]] * [[Saint-Stanislas, Mauricie, Quebec|Saint-Stanislas]] * [[Saint-Adelphe, Quebec|Saint-Adelphe]] * [[Sainte-Thècle, Quebec|Sainte-Thècle]] ==Major intersections== {| class=wikitable ![[List of regional county municipalities and equivalent territories in
